casebody.data:
[Rockingham,

June, 1881.] School-Districts 4 and 5 in Hampstead v. Eastman & a. Gr. O. <f G. K. Bartlett and Wiggin, for the plaintiffs. Sawyer f Sawyer, Jr., for the defendants.

Petition, for a writ of certiorari to quash the proceedings of a board of selectmen and school committee changing the lines of school-districts. G. L., c. 86, s. 9. Facts found by a referee. The petition was granted, and the proceedings were quashed for the disqualification of a member of the board.

All concurred.
